title: Chemical fingerprinting and multicomponent quantitative analysis for quality control of Cinnamomum tamala collected from Western Himalaya by HPLC-DAD
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Bibhuti Bhusan Champati, Prabhat Kumar Das, Chiranjibi Sahoo, Asit Ray, Sudipta Jena, Ambika Sahoo, Sanghamitra Nayak, Swaran Lata, Pratap Chandra Panda
